text: Klaus Huhn (24 February 1928 – 20 January 2017) was a German sports journalist, writer and sports administrator. Huhn worked for the East German mass-market daily newspaper, Neues Deutschland, and was chairman of the Sports Journalists Sub-Association within that country's important Union of Journalists. He was born in Berlin. Huhn died on 20 January 2017 in Berlin, aged 88.Wolfgang Hübner: Eine große Nummer, Nachruf in Neues Deutschland, 21. title: Klaus Huhn
